messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine an art office with 21 artists. Amy is working with Bob, Cal, Dan, Eva, Fay, and Gus. Ian is working with Joe, Kim, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Sue is working with Tom, Zac, Kai, Liv, Pam, and Gia. Fay is working with Gus, Bob, Cal, Dan, and Eva. Cal is working with Dan, Eva, Gus, and Bob. Kim is working with Dan, Leo, Max, Ned, and Ola. Ned is working with Ola, Joe, Leo, and Max. Pam is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, Kai, and Liv. Eva is working with Gus, Bob and Zac. Leo is working with Max, Ola, and Joe. Max is connected to Ola and Joe. Liv is working with Gia, Tom, Zac, and Kai. Gus is working with Bob, and Dan. Ola is working with Joe. Gia is working Tom, Zac, and Kai. Bob is working with Dan. Joe is working with Kai. Kai is working with Tom. Tom is working with Zac. What is the shortest path from Gus to Liv? Please list the names in order, separated by commas.

This is a simple game with some randomness you can type in the console for 8 different people to play. With the annoyances when not typing fast enough in the console, I managed to hit 15 clicks with my time of 1:22.340. Not sure if this result was beaten, but I hope to see this place again someday. I will attempt to solve this in a few days from now in a JS MOOC.

This is a challenging problem set. There is a cheat-sheet for completing the problems using array indexes (which I used). I hope in the next year, I can beat the challenges. Overall, this is fun for sure.

This is a neat challenge. Dot The Leaves. There were a few randomly generated dots with pre-existing "leaves". Since each pixel represented a leaf, it would be a process with a dozen clicks in a dozen tries. At times, I cannot wait for these pixels to be refreshed. It took me over four days to solve the code. I didn't feel too much satisfaction at seeing the challenges. Why?

These challenges are not just a few clicks. They are passion for position, aesthetics, etc. They are a lot to figure out and get used
